column4: multi app sound can be a real hassle dependng on the sound card.
is it worth me grabbing my old audigy 2 value and using that? I would have preferred my nice 24bit onboard, though...
audigy2 i have - has lasted me the last 4 machines.. It may sound much better then any onboard cards you have.
lets just say ive never had any hassles with my audigy cards under linux. :)
